title: ATypI t-s 50th anniversary self picture
content:
It was a real honour to be selected to design one of the 5 t-shirts to celebrate the 50 years of ATypI.  
So, if you go to Brighton these year you could get one. I m not going but a mail package just arrived yesterday (thanks Petra).  
I know it still needs iron but I ve not resisted to wear it :P

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019080618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SL271396w_5638.jpg)
author: Ale Paul

comments.content: I am going to Brighton (first time!), and I sure wish I’ll get one of these. Great work, Alejandro.

Ale,  
If I iron it, can I have it? :-)

ChrisL
